extendedInfo.description: Kryptoid is simple arithmetic card game.  Version 1.02 is very basic, and feedback is welcome.Directions:1) Add the Kryptoid widget to your home screen to play at a glance.2) Add, subtract, multiply, or divide the the first five cards to obtain the result on the sixth card.3) Click on the widget to deal a new hand.

reviews.comment: There is no user interaction. Make this a real app rather than widget with interaction instead of just a list and i would rerate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Scam at worst. Fail at best.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Let me dwld but doesn\'t come up in my apps n doesn\'t let me open it in the market
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: You HAVE to open it as a widget no app option & no interaction with the widget other than deck change. Should be clarified in description.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Just like the card game without holding the cards! Can\'t stop playing! The icon dowmloads to android widgets, then you add it as a widget to home screen.
reviews.author: Debra Wood

reviews.comment: I get a \"Launch Error\" on my Samsung Moment. It says \"Krypto Could Not Be Launched\" when trying to launch this game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I couldn\'t find the icon. The program has access to phone calls. Why?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: For serious number crunchers only!
reviews.comment: No entertainment, bells or whistles, just the cards. If you like Krypto, and don\'t need anybody to confirm your solutions, this widget is for you. Only wish it had options to include the fraction cards!
reviews.author: A Google User
